page.title: 13Home Life in Canterbury
page.content: 8.45 Woke up, had breakfast. 9.30 Watched 'Scooby Doo' on TV. My sister went dancing. Mum left 16p for sweets. I read a Fighting fantasy{game}book. 10.45 I played with our neighbour, and his toy soldiers (USA v USSR) 11.45 Finished a{computer}program for Fighting fantasy battles. 1.30 My Mum got lunch. 1.45 My sister and I went biking. 2.30 My Dad went to buy a sunshade. 3.00 My Dad bought me a 'Famous Five'{book}for Â£3.50. I get 75p pocket money a week. 5.00 Put TV on.{Supper}of roast potatoes, meat and cabbage. 6.00 I played Space Invaders. 7.00 I played Triplets with Dad. 8.30 I went to bed and read.
